head.name: Soy Pedro Medina!
head.description: Tecnico Informatico, Desarrollador Web y Apasionada por la tecnología.

projectBakery.title: Bakery
projectBakery.description: A bakery website that allows you to order online. It was developed with React, Tailwind CSS and Vite. It is a responsive website that adapts to all devices. It has a shopping cart, a product list and a contact form.

footer.messageOne: Cada línea de código que escribes es un paso hacia la maestría.
footer.messageTwo: El código limpio hoy será tu orgullo mañana.
